title: Harper Sacredstriker
content:
Harper Sacredstriker Rare 2~9 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6)+1 Bludgeoning Weapon Enchantment +1 Spiritual Weapon Main Hand OnlyTopple This quarterstaff is as solid as the bond between each member of the Harpers - even working in anonymity, they do so with a common and righteous cause.
